participant_1.name: Lila Chen
participant_1.personality: Lila is introspective and calm, often seeking deeper meaning in life. She embraces a minimalist lifestyle and enjoys connecting with nature.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation. i live in alaska. i am a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Mark Thompson
participant_2.personality: Mark is energetic and sociable, with a passion for sports and outdoor activities. He loves engaging with others and enjoys sharing his experiences.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

content.text: Oh Alaska must be cold. I live in Singapore
i am a little tired from work
